input.rewritten_query: 查询本周学生出勤异常情况

hidden_context_result.failed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.student_no, student.real_name, course.course_name, attendance.status, attendance.attend_date FROM attendance JOIN student ON attendance.student_id = student.id JOIN course_class ON attendance.course_class_id = course_class.id JOIN course ON course_class.course_id = course.id WHERE attendance.status IN ('缺勤', '迟到', '早退') AND attendance.attend_date >= '2024-06-10' AND attendance.attend_date <= '2024-06-16' AND attendance.is_deleted = 0 AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND course.is_deleted = 0 AND course_class.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.student_no, base.real_name, base.course_name, base.status, base.attend_date FROM base ORDER BY base.student_no, base.attend_date
hidden_context_result.rewritten_query: 查询本周学生出勤异常情况

probe_samples.probe_sql: SELECT DISTINCT student.student_no AS value FROM student WHERE student.student_no IS NOT NULL AND student.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT student.real_name AS value FROM student WHERE student.real_name IS NOT NULL AND student.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT course.course_name AS value FROM course WHERE course.course_name IS NOT NULL AND course.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT attendance.status AS value FROM attendance WHERE attendance.status IS NOT NULL AND attendance.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT attendance.attend_date AS value FROM attendance WHERE attendance.attend_date IS NOT NULL AND attendance.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT attendance.student_id AS value FROM attendance WHERE attendance.student_id IS NOT NULL AND attendance.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT student.id AS value FROM student WHERE student.id IS NOT NULL AND student.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT attendance.course_class_id AS value FROM attendance WHERE attendance.course_class_id IS NOT NULL AND attendance.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT course_class.id AS value FROM course_class WHERE course_class.id IS NOT NULL AND course_class.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT course_class.course_id AS value FROM course_class WHERE course_class.course_id IS NOT NULL AND course_class.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT course.id AS value FROM course WHERE course.id IS NOT NULL AND course.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT attendance.is_deleted AS value FROM attendance WHERE attendance.is_deleted IS NOT NULL AND attendance.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT student.is_deleted AS value FROM student WHERE student.is_deleted IS NOT NULL AND student.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT course.is_deleted AS value FROM course WHERE course.is_deleted IS NOT NULL AND course.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT course_class.is_deleted AS value FROM course_class WHERE course_class.is_deleted IS NOT NULL AND course_class.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20

output.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.student_no, student.real_name, course.course_name, attendance.status, attendance.attend_date FROM attendance JOIN student ON attendance.student_id = student.id JOIN course_class ON attendance.course_class_id = course_class.id JOIN course ON course_class.course_id = course.id WHERE attendance.status != '正常' AND attendance.attend_date >= '2024-06-10' AND attendance.attend_date <= '2024-06-16' AND attendance.is_deleted = 0 AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND course.is_deleted = 0 AND course_class.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.student_no, base.real_name, base.course_name, base.status, base.attend_date FROM base ORDER BY base.student_no, base.attend_date

entity_mappings.reason: 根据任务解析的时间范围映射到考勤日期字段，时间范围为2024-06-10至2024-06-16
根据probe_samples中attendance.status的候选值['缺勤','迟到','早退','出勤']，异常状态对应非'出勤'状态，使用!= '正常'进行过滤
